http://boards.4chan.org/pol/thread/190261961/hong-konger-moving-to-vancouver

Hong Konger moving to Vancouver
Anonymous (ID: 6BLGhQSg) 10/22/18(Mon)00:27:47
So i'm moving to Vancouver, BC next week. I am Chinese and I hear a lot of things regarding this city such as us taking it over.

Is Vancouver really a Chinese colony that i've been hearing about, I feel like its quite exaggerated.

Also, any general tips about living in Vancouver or Canada in General.

thanks!

Anonymous (ID: eBBo0F/1) AC 10/22/18(Mon)00:29:02
>>190261961 (OP)
Fuck off, We're full

Anonymous (ID: rrHfI1Yj) 10/22/18(Mon)00:33:06
Proxy bait

Anonymous (ID: Taq8PDiR) 10/22/18(Mon)00:47:08
>>190261961 (OP)
fuck you. We are full. You are part of the overflow.
you might come now but I cannot guarantee what the future (i.e 10 years for now) holds.
you've been warned.


Anonymous (ID: b4Tfnzj2) 10/22/18(Mon)00:47:45
A friend of mine that lives there said its so bad he was forced to learn mandarin just to interact with show owners. Fuck off we're full.

Anonymous (ID: LsflpOOi) 10/22/18(Mon)00:48:22
>>190261961 (OP)
I visited Hongcouver in 2005. Hardly saw any white people, lots of Chinese who didn't speak a word of English. I'd imagine it's much, much worse in 2018.

Anonymous (ID: e36fKdZ7) 10/22/18(Mon)00:49:18
Stay in Hong Kong yellow rat.

Anyway good luck, I support Chinese taking over the west compared to the alternatives.

[One Will Against Colonialism — One Nation Towards Independence]

It is all thanks to the support of one and all within the pro-independence camp that, within barely half a year since the founding of the HKNP, the support for the idea of our city's independence has grown surely and steadily. And yet the reality remains that, for the majority of Hong Kong, any substantial commitment to politics is a rare sight. Too often a Hong Konger finds himself sympathetic to our cause at heart, and yet the diverse considerations of the modern urban life binds his tongue speechless, his pen inkless, and his limbs actionless. The HKNP is all too understanding of this.
